node.title: Rimutaka Prison escapee may have left Wellington - police
node.description: A prisoner has escaped from Rimutaka Prison, and police believe he may leave, or has already left, Wellington.
node.content:
["A prisoner has escaped from Rimutaka Prison, and police believe he may leave, or has already left, Wellington.", "", "
John Douglas Willis, 59. Photo: Supplied / NZ Police
", "John Douglas Willis, 59, escaped from the prison yesterday afternoon, police said.", "Police did not say how he left, but said he was last seen driving a white 2008 Toyota Hiace van.", "They are now appealing for any information on Willis' whereabouts or sightings of the described vehicle.", "Anyone with information can call police on 111 and refer to file number 220218/5736 or anonymously via Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111."]
